errors.exists2: already exists, so yours wasn't added. Instead, use `+context edit`.
errors.cancelledPrompt: so this prompt has been cancelled.

notAllowed: You're not a translator or proofreader, so you can't use this!
notProofreader: You're not a proofreader, so you can't use this! We're working on a way to let you suggest context too.
incorrectArgument:
Please enter a subcommand as first argument. This can either be `get`, `add`, `edit`, `link` or `help`.
For information, run `+context help`.
editedResult:
Edited this context entry! The new data is shown below.

**Context**
tryRunGet: We couldn't find the resulting entry. Try to run `+context get <string ID>` to see the result instead.
willAdd: The following entry will be added. Please react with 📑 if you'd like to add more to the entry or change existing fields (such as a screenshot or a language note). React with <:vote_yes:732298639749152769> to submit. This will be cancelled in two minutes or when you hit <:vote_no:732298639736570007>.
promptAddMore: Send a message (without the prefix) containing `<field> <content>`. <field> can be `screenshot`, `id`, `context` or a language code. <content> needs to be the new content for that string, such as the screenshot link.
addedMore: Added this information to the context entry. Re-react with 📑 to add more.
added: Added the context entry! Loading the result...
addedResult:
Added the context entry! It is shown below.

**Context**
specifyFieldEdit:
You forgot to specify what field to edit!
Please follow this format: `+context edit <string ID> <field to change> <new value>`.
To see all available fields, run `+context help`.
confirm: Please confirm this change by reacting with <:vote_yes:732298639749152769> within 10 seconds. To cancel, wait or react with <:vote_no:732298639736570007>.

info.title: Help for `+context`
info.description: Below is a list of all subcommands for this command and their explanations. **Fields** shows all available fields.
info.get:
_Gets context for given string_
`+context get <string ID>`

Replace <string ID> with the ID of the string, found by copying the string URL. It's the number after the #.
info.add:
_Adds a context entry_
`+context add <string ID> <context>`

Replace <string ID> with the ID of the string, found by copying the string URL. It's the number after the #. Replace <context> with the text you want to add. After running, you can add more fields using the reactions.
info.edit:
_Edits an existing context entry_
`+context edit <string ID> <field> <new value>`

Replace <string ID> with the ID of the string, found by copying the string URL. It's the number after the #. Replace <field> with the field you want to edit, such as `screenshot` or `enpt`. Replace <new value> with the new value for that field.
info.view:
_Gives you a link to the Google Sheet containing context_
`+context view`
info.sheetD:
[Click here to open the Google Sheet containing context information.](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1tVLWskn4InBeopmRdQyrDumr1H6STqyidcEwoL4a8ts)

Only specific people can open this sheet. You can request access on the page you see when following the link. Please fill in your Crowdin profile link (`.../profile/<username>`) and your Discord username.
Keep in mind Stannya, Rodry and QkeleQ10 can see your Google profile name and email.
